entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 near Cape Race this morning and early this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 13 March 2023
